item.title: Gyeongmin "Min" Lee
item.description: About Myself Hi ðŸ‘‹ I’m Min, a software engineer with experience in Front-end development and AWS. I’m passionate about using technology to address real-world issues. I’m currently looking for a full-time position in British Columbia. In my spare time, I enjoy researching front-end frameworks and how they can be used to build better user experiences. I also enjoy reading books on software development and personal growth. Some of my favourites are The Pragmatic Programmer and Code: The Hidden Language of Computer Hardware and Software.
